articles.title: 10 benefits of physical activity for the elderly - The Times of India
articles.description: The benefits of physical activity for the elderly are vast and varied, extending beyond just physical health to improve mental and emotional well-being.  It's never too late to start reaping the benefits of an active lifestyle!
articles.content: Regular physical activity can lower the risk of developing chronic diseases such as type 2 diabetes, stroke, and certain cancers. Exercise helps in managing blood sugar levels, improving insulin sens… [+37 chars]
